description.value:
This portable nozzle-and-trigger assembly based on spider spinnerets can extrude and weave alchemical adhesives into temporary constructions. As an Interact action, you can attach a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Glue Bomb (Lesser)]{Glue Bomb} to the extruder.

Activate 1 (manipulate)

Requirements A glue bomb is installed in the extruder

Effect The extruder converts the glue bomb into a 30-foot rope, whip, or net, depending on the nozzle die you choose when activating the device. The created object lasts for 1 hour. The DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] a created rope (if used to bind a creature) or net is equal to the consumed glue bomb's DC and Escaping destroys the created object.
